casebody.data:
U.S. BANK, NATIONAL ASSOCIATION, Trustee
v.
Moses NELSON et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided June 14, 2017

Moses Nelson, self-represented, in support of the petition.

David M. Bizar, in opposition.

The named defendant's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 173 Conn.App. 34, 161 A.3d 1290 (2017), is denied.
